-- | Monokai colour theme for the Yi text editor
--   
@package yi-monokai
@version 0.1.1.2


module Yi.Style.Monokai

-- | The main theme specification. An example use in your <tt>yi.hs</tt>
--   might look something like
--   
--   <pre>
--   main :: IO ()
--   main = yi $ myConfig {
--     defaultKm = defaultKm myConfig
--     , startFrontEnd = start
--     , configUI = (configUI defaultConfig) { configTheme = monokaiTheme }
--     }
--   </pre>
monokaiTheme :: Proto UIStyle

-- | Hex value: 0xF8F8F2
monokaiYellowLight :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x75715E
monokaiYellowDark :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xE6DB74
monokaiYellow :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xFD5FF1
monokaiPurpleLight :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xF92672
monokaiMagenta :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x272822
monokaiGreyDark :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xA6E22A
monokaiGreen :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xE6E6E6
monokaiGreyLight :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x595959
monokaiGreyLightest :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x141411
monokaiGreyDarkest :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x595959
monokaiGrey :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x383830
monokaiGreyDarker :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0x89BDFF
monokaiBlueLight :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xAE81FF
monokaiPurple :: Color

-- | Hex value: 0xA6E22E
monokaiGreenLight :: Color
